name: Spark Collaboration
shortdescription: Spark Collaboration is a social networking platform that seeks to create connections where they normally wouldn't occur.

name: Primal Blueprint
description: Arguably the largest e-commerce/online-community for the revolutionary primal lifestyle is The Primal Blueprint. Join fitness guru Mark Sisson and our friendly ancestor, Grok, as they help you discover how amazingly simple and fun lifelong wellness can be by providing a complete diet, exercise and lifestyle philosophy, along with various products, services and community support, to help you enjoy effortless weight loss, vibrant health and boundless energy. The Primal Blueprint is based on lifestyle principles that have governed human health, evolution and peak performance for over two million years, and is supported by respected research in the fields of epigenetics and evolutionary biology. The Primal Blueprint principles challenge many elements of conventional wisdom that, while well intentioned, are deeply flawed and are making people fat, sick and burnt out.

My role in developing Primal Blueprint included both frontend and backend development using Magento to handle both the customer and admin interfaces. Additionally, I managed some of the core functionality of the coaching center, such as user registration and blogging.
And before you check out this site, you should know that their Avocado Oil Mayo will make you question why anyone would ever use its normal counterpart anymore.

name: Vocatio
shortdescription: Discover the path to your dream job
description:
The magic of Vocatio is twofold:
  1. It helps those who are undecided on what career paths to take discover which ones are suitable for them and
  2. It acts as a liason between employers and potential employees by facilitating the recruitment process

Upon registering, users may take a custom Job Fit Assessment, a thorough examination into one's personality and compatibility with various careers. No answer is wrong as there are multiple career choices for every type of personality. The results of this assessment, along with other information such as past experience or project files, can be made available to employers if their requests to view them are accepted

Companies and recruiters, who enjoy their own version of Vocatio, are able to immediately engage with potential employees by posting jobs,  messaging job seekers, and joining or posting content in "career groups," separate subcommunities dedicated to the discussion of their respective careers.

name: Neroli
shortdescription: My portfolio website, you're browsing it now!
description: My portfolio website is designed to highlight important information so potential employers can have a quick glance before reading further. It features a dynamic color palette and some small features like this portfolio.
